title: Oravel Stays to launch self operated premium hotels under the Palette brand
description: The company said to ensure 'enhanced' guest experience and service delivery, it will take direct operational control of select Palette hotels in 'high-growth' and 'promising' locations. Oravel Stays intends to open 12 additional self-operated Palette hotels by the end of the year.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
